Row.Text: Horus, the bright god, reborn into this person you see before you. Horus who is Hatshepsut. All that surrounds the sun works for me. Do you?
I am Horus in human flesh — Hatshepsut, pharaoh of the red lands and the black lands.
I am Horus in human flesh — Hatshepsut, pharaoh of the red lands and the black lands.
I am Horus in human flesh — Hatshepsut, pharaoh of the red lands and the black lands.
When we are done, the lone and level sands will be all that remains of you.
The nau-snake is in my belly, and I have not given myself to you, your flame will not be on me.
Open the Netherworld so that I may see my father Osiris and drive away darkness, for I am beloved of him. All you spirits, prepare a path for me.
